author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
The Retail-Packaged 2-Player Starter set with 77 models, terrain, game mat, tokens and dice from One Page Rules is going up later this month for pre-order on Gamefound and I was lucky enough to get sent a prototype to try out! Bob and I have painted up the Robot Legions and Saurian Starhost to play through the boxed set. let's check it out!

Get notified on Gamefound HERE:https://gamefound.com/en/projects/onepagerules/grimdark-future-battle-box

GMG is publicly supported. Become a backer on Patreon to ensure new content and that the Studio can continue: https://www.patreon.com/guerrillaminiaturegames 

Join us on DISCORD: https://discord.com/invite/XTqqxctryq

Want to challenge Ash to a game? Email him at GuerrillaMiniatureGames@gmail.com or message him through his Facebook Page!

Follow Ash on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/outofthebasementintothestreets

GMG Measuring Gauges and Tokens available HERE: http://deathraydesigns.com/product-category/accessories/guerrilla-miniature-ga
title: Let's Play! - Grimdark Future: BROKEN TRUTH by One Page Rules

author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
The BIG HATS ARE BACK! Tusks and all the Helsmiths of Hashut are Games Workshop's Nostalgia blitz back to a time when Chaos Dwarfs were tiny of legs and huge of headgear. With a brand new model range consisting of some lovely big centrepiece kits and modular troops, this box contains both the cards, battletome and a complete Spearhead to get this new Chaos faction on the table. Let's check it out.

Thanks to Games Workshop for the complimentary copy of the box to review. 
#HelsmithsofHashut

#AdWIP

#AoS

#WarhammerCommunity
